location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:327 x 266 mm, on sheet 381 x 286 mm

mods.abstract: Imprint:Reproduced by the Survey of Egypt, 1st March 1917 (758Z).Distinctive Features:Outline map of Hejaz showing routes across the region with districts and approximate location of major tribes indicated. Contains a key to symbols at the bottom left-hand corner. Routes numbered for reference and described in detail in the Handbook.
